isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB COWL TRAY

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Cowl Tray on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600 and 8500 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models before September 2000
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 117 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the hole in the passenger side of the cowl tray (Item 2) over the antenna (Item 4), lower cowl tray into position at cab cowl.
Slide the holes in the cowl tray (Item 2) over both driver and passenger side wiper pivot posts (Item 16).

Slide mounting holes of cowl tray (Item 2) at the bottom of both driver and passenger side over the mounting studs (Item 13) on the cab cowl. Make sure that the plastic bracket on the passenger side of the cowl tray slides in behind the mounting bracket (Item 6, view arrow D) and that the plastic bracket (Item 8, view arrow C) at the lower front of the cowl tray is in place at the evaporator box (Item 14) of AC unit.
Install hex flanged nut (Item 11, view arrow B) under cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow B) on driver side. Tighten to 16 Lbf-ft (22 N•m), DO NOT exceed 18 Lbf-ft (24 N•m).
Install hex flanged nut (Item 12, view arrow D) under cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow D) on passenger side. Tighten to 16 Lbf-ft (22 N•m), DO NOT exceed 18 Lbf-ft (24 N•m).
Install hex flanged bolt (Item 9, section A - A) into center mounting bracket (Item 10, section A - A) at the center of cowl tray (Item 2, section A - A). DO NOT over tighten.

Install torx pan head screw (Item 7, view arrow C) through plastic bracket (Item 8, view arrow C) at the lower front of the cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow C) into evaporator box (Item 14) of AC unit. DO NOT over tighten.

Install hex flanged bolt (Item 5, view arrow D) through mounting bracket (Item 6, view arrow D) into u-shaped speed nut (Item 15) on plastic bracket under cowl tray (Item 2) on passenger side. DO NOT over tighten.
Slide rubber seal (Item 3, view arrow E) down over antenna (Item 4, view arrow E) on passenger side.
Install washer hose (Item 1, view arrow A) onto fitting under cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow A) on driver side.

After installing cowl tray, install driver and passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assembly. Refer to
WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
. For installing driver and passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assembly on 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700 and 8500 models, refer to Install Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700 and 8500 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600 and 8500 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. For installing driver and passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assembly on 8600 models, refer to Install Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 8600 Model.
Lower tilt hood to closed position and latch hood on both sides.
Turn wipers on to high speed and activate windshield washer to check for proper operation. Adjust position of windshield wiper arm and blade assembly if required to obtain proper wiper operation.

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Cowl Tray on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 8600 Model
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 120 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the hole in the passenger side of the cowl tray (Item 2) over the antenna (Item 4), lower cowl tray into position at cab cowl.
Slide the holes in the cowl tray (Item 2) over both driver and passenger side wiper pivot posts (Item 15).
Slide mounting holes of cowl tray (Item 2) at the bottom of both driver and passenger side over the mounting studs (Item 14) on the cab cowl.

Install hex flanged nut (Item 13, view arrow D) under cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow D) on passenger side. Tighten to 16 Lbf-ft (22 N•m), DO NOT exceed 18 Lbf-ft (24 N•m).
Install hex flanged bolt (Item 10, section A - A) into center mounting bracket (Item 11, section A - A) at the center of cowl tray (Item 2, section A - A). DO NOT over tighten.
Position angle bracket (Item 6) in place at the AC evaporator box (Item 9) at the front of cowl tray (Item 2) on passenger side and install torx pan head screw (Item 8). DO NOT over tighten.

Install hex flanged bolt (Item 5, view arrow C) through the angle bracket (Item 6, view arrow C) into u-shaped speed nut (Item 16) on the cowl tray mounting bracket (Item 7, view arrow C) under the cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow C) on passenger side. DO NOT over tighten.
Slide rubber seal (Item 3, view arrow E) down over the antenna (Item 4, view arrow E) on passenger side.
Install washer hose (Item 1, view arrow A) onto the fitting under cowl tray (Item 2, view arrow A) on driver side.

WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
. For installing driver and passenger side windshield wiper arm and blade assembly, refer to Install Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly on Standard Cab and Extended Cab for 8600 Model.
